structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Any collecting officer who fails to settle and pay any installment of assessments with interest, as and when provided by KRS 74.190, shall be liable to the commission for the full amount certified to him, with interest. Such amount may be collected from such collecting officer by order issued against him by the District Court, on five (5) days' notice in writing. The collecting officer shall be liable on his official bond for acts done under KRS 74.190, and for the faithful performance of his duties prescribed therein.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 66, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938g-13.
